episodes.title: Episode 1: The New Beginning
episodes.description: In this exciting premiere, the U-20 Japan National Team begins their journey as they prepare for their debut match.

episodes.title: Episode 2: Rivals Unite
episodes.description: Former rivals must learn to work together as they face their first challenge as a team.

episodes.title: Episode 3: The First Test
episodes.description: The team faces their first real test as they compete against a formidable opponent in a practice match.

episodes.title: Episode 4: Breaking Point
episodes.description: Tensions rise as the pressure of the upcoming tournament begins to affect team dynamics.

episodes.title: Episode 5: The Turning Tide
episodes.description: A surprising turn of events forces the team to reevaluate their strategy and individual roles.
